relation: The fitness center is fairly new and free for students
Arrive in time to park and get to class.

Northampton is a strong community college with teachers that truly care and is widely accepted to numerous 4-year institutions. I have attended as a traditional and non-traditional student and the flexibility and array of day, night, and online courses make it easy to fit into any schedule. The biggest complaint about NACC is tight parking, which tells you how great a school it is if there are that many students enrolled

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I love it here and I actually hate when the semester ends. I wish I could go year round. Am learning a lot The teachers here are great. The work is challenging but I do not feel overworked. I feel that the work really relates to my major as well.
